name: Mushy Stuff: A Belated Valentine!
description:
Happy Belated Valentine's Day, Laurence! Precisely a month overdue!

Use arrow or WASD keys to move and forward text.
You can always interact with white things.
There are other bits of explorative text here and there.
Moving to some tiles will take you to a new location.
Playtime is about 5-10 minutes.

Have fun!
